DOC.detailed_description: The study aim check preliminary evidence bright light may help lose weight obese people ( Thor Helge Bergan , Norvay , 2002 , unpublished ) . Subjects : age 20-65 , BMI > 30 , non-seasonal ( SPAQ score < 8 , seasonal problem ) , good general health , regular sleep 22:00-1:00 6:00-9:00 . Study season : November-April . Placebo-controlled , single-blind , crossover . At least 1 mo two arm ; similar phase menstrual cycle ( present ) . If could complete first year , second arm do next winter . Intervention : Lightbox ( 4300 lux ) - one arm , deactivate ioniser - another arm ( sequential alternation upon enter study ) 3 week morning ( least 18 day ) start 6:00-9:00 . Seating distance ( face device ) 41 cm , duration - 30 min . Diet : target amount kcal per day calculate base age , weight gender ( WHO ) , e.g . woman 40 ang 80 kg 1502 kcal per day . Food content - also recommend WHO . Food distribution day - usual particular test subject constant session . Food diary complete daily subject calculate kcal base Table kcal . Outcomes : Weight measure visit doctor day day 3-week session , also home every week . Motivation Expectation rat 3-point scale Diary , begin session . Mood , activity appetite self-estimated use VAS-like 10-points scale every week . At end arm `` Easiness dieting '' scale Adverse event ( ) complete . In diary , also columns sleep time , intervention time , duration distance , number kcal . A target number subject complete study 40 .
